title: Beautifully upgraded 2 bedroom 2 bathroom home
posting_body: Beautifully upgraded home in Renaissance community of Woodridge.
Private end unit with wonderful low maintenance patio, yard & deck.
Hardwood floors on the main, new paint throughout, newer travertine, stone, & ceramic tile floors in entry & both bathrooms.
Kitchen has newer stainless refrigerator & dishwasher.
Access from dining area to lovely deck & stairs to yard.
Large primary bedroom on upper level with big walk-in closet plus a spacious bathroom plus washer/dryer on upper level.
Lower level bedroom with own full bathroom.
A great opportunity to live, work, commute, shop & enjoy the access & conveniences of a fantastic location that is second to none.
Email your number to set up a showing!
